original_text: And these are the numbers of the bands that were ready armed to the war, and came to David to Hebron, to turn the kingdom of Saul to him, according to the word of the Lord.
korean_text: 싸움을 준비한 군대 지휘관들이 헤브론에 이르러 다윗에게로 나아와서 여호와의 말씀대로 사울의 나라를 그에게 돌리고자 하였으니 그 수효가 이러하였더라

sentences.original_text: of the bands that were ready armed
and came to David to Hebron
to turn the kingdom of Saul to him
according to the word of the Lord
